EmailTemplate.name: Jirafe Refresh Survey.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: We’d love your feedback on our Analytics reports
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
As we work on new features, we like to reach out to customers to get their thoughts. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We hope you’ve found our Analytics reports helpful for growing your business. As we work on new features, we like to reach out to customers to get their thoughts.
Today, we would love to hear what you think about our Analytics reports. Can you please take 5 minutes to give us some feedback?
Take our survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/7JXPTVR]]> Sara Smith
BigCommerce Sales Associate
sara.smith@bigcommerce.com <[[mailto:sara.smith@bigcommerce.com]]> / 1-888-699-8911 <[[tel:+18886998911]]> ext 313
bigcommerce.com <[[http://www.bigcommerce.com]]>
